title: 2015년 United States Ex Rel. Antoon v. Cleveland Clinic Foundation 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: United States Ex Rel. Antoon v. Cleveland Clinic Foundation. 판결일: 2015-06-11. 법원: Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: UNITED STATES of America Ex Rel. David F. ANTOON and Linda R. Antoon, Relators-Appellants, v. CLEVELAND CLINIC FOUNDATION and Intuitive Surgical, Inc., Et Al., Defendants-Appellees
**판결일**: 2015-06-11
**법원**: Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit
**관할**: USA, Federal

**판사**: Gibbons, Lawson, McKEAGUE

## 변호인

ARGUED: Matthew C. Schultz, Bran-non & Associates, Dayton, Ohio, for Appellants. Matthew C. Corcoran, Jones Day, Columbus, Ohio, for Cleveland Clinic Appellees. Colter L. Paulson, Squire Sanders (US) LLP, Cincinnati, Ohio, for Appellee Intuitive Surgical. ON BRIEF: Matthew C. Schultz, Dwight D. Brannon, Brannon & Associates, Dayton, Ohio, for Appellants. Matthew C. Corcoran, Chad A. Readier, Jones Day, Columbus, Ohio, Stephen G. Sozio, Jones Day, Cleveland, Ohio, for Cleveland Clinic Appellees. 

## 인용

- 788 F.3d 605
